name: CharacterGameFeel
shortDescription: Add game feel to your platformer character object.
description: Add game feel behavior to your platformer character object to get the animations:
- **Idle:** gives your character breath animation while not moving.
- **Jump:** gives your character squash and stretch animation when jumping.
- **Fall:** gives your character stretch animation when falling.
- **Land:** gives your character squash and stretch animation when landing.
- Includes the options (Scale strength/Scaling speed) for every animation.
- In the events add the action [Separate player object from floor object] to avoid any kind of bugs.
- Your sprite "origin" point, must be at the center bottom.
- Your sprite bottom collision, must be filled entirely.

events.comment: Boolean to check if the idle animation is unchecked in the behavior
Tween the object to its normal scale if its moving
Tween the object to first step of breathing animation
Tween the object to the second step of breathing animation (scaling back to 1)
Repeat when the breath animation has finished (loop)
Boolean to check if the jump animation is unchecked in the behavior
Tween the object to first step of jumping (squash)
Tween the object to second step of jumping (Stretch)
Tween back to object original scale
Boolean to give the ability to repeat after standing on floor
Boolean to check if the fall animation is unchecked in the behavior
Stretch the object when falling
If the land animation is unchecked, Tween the object to its normal scale
If the land animation is checked, give the ability to do the fall animation again
If the land animation is unchecked, give the ability to do the fall animation again after the tween
Boolean to check if the fall animation is unchecked in the behavior
Booleans to check if the object is landing
Squash the object when landing
Tween back to object original scale after squashing
Boolean to give the ability to do the land animation again

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object game feel animation is playing.
eventsFunctions.name: AnimationIsPlaying

propertyDescriptors.label: Idle animation
propertyDescriptors.description: Apply breath animation on the object.
propertyDescriptors.name: AIdleCheck

propertyDescriptors.label: Jump animation
propertyDescriptors.description: Apply squash and stretch animation on the object.
propertyDescriptors.name: FJumpCheck

propertyDescriptors.label: Fall animation
propertyDescriptors.description: Apply stretch animation on the object.
propertyDescriptors.name: IallCheck

propertyDescriptors.label: Land animation
propertyDescriptors.description: Apply squash animation on the object.
propertyDescriptors.name: LandCheck
